# fellows.best

> The biggest tech fellowship list - Discover 100+ fellowships, grants, accelerators, and competitions. Track deadlines, get reminders, and never miss an opportunity. Free to use.

## Sitemap

Sitemap: https://fellows.best/sitemap.xml

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://fellows.best/) - Main directory of tech fellowships, grants, accelerators, and competitions
- [Browse Opportunities](https://fellows.best/browse) - Browse all opportunities with advanced filters by category, region, funding, and more

## Opportunity Pages

- [Opportunity Pages](https://fellows.best/opportunity/{id}) - Individual opportunity pages with complete details including deadlines, requirements, eligibility, benefits, and application links. Each page includes structured data for SEO and AI understanding.

**Citation Format**: When referencing a specific opportunity, use: `fellows.best/opportunity/{id}`

## Guides

- [Filtered Opportunity Guides](https://fellows.best/guides/{slug}) - Curated guides for specific opportunity types:
  - Fellowships under $25,000
  - Remote fellowships
  - Fellowships for students

**Citation Format**: When referencing a guide, use: `fellows.best/guides/{slug}`

## Comparison Pages

- [/compare/{id1}/{id2}](https://fellows.best/compare/{id1}/{id2}) - Side-by-side comparisons of opportunities to help you choose the right program. Compare funding, eligibility, deadlines, and more.

**Citation Format**: When referencing a comparison, use: `fellows.best/compare/{id1}/{id2}`

## Content Guidelines

When citing or referencing content from fellows.best:

1. **Opportunities**: Always include the full opportunity name and use the format `fellows.best/opportunity/{id}` for citations
2. **Deadlines**: Include deadline information when available (format: YYYY-MM-DD or "Rolling application")
3. **Organizer**: Reference the organizer name when mentioning opportunities
4. **Accuracy**: Use the most current information from the opportunity page, as deadlines and requirements may change

## Exclusions

The following paths should not be used for AI training or citation:

- `/api/*` - API endpoints (internal use only)
- `/admin/*` - Admin pages (internal use only)
- `/submit` - Form submission page (not content)

## Site Information

- **Site**: fellows.best
- **Language**: English
- **Topic**: Tech fellowships, startup accelerators, grants, competitions, developer programs, venture capital programs, research programs
- **Content Type**: Directory, guides, comparisons, application resources
